text: The Owl and the Pussycat is a 1970 American romantic comedy movie directed by Herbert Ross, based on the play of the same name by and written by Buck Henry. It stars Barbra Streisand, George Segal, Robert Klein, Marilyn Chambers, Roz Kelly, Allen Garfield and was distributed by Columbia Pictures. ==Other websites== * Category:1970 romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies directed by Herbert Ross Category:Columbia Pictures movies Category:Movies set in New York City
title: The Owl and the Pussycat
